attributes.action: Stop the sale of British energy to the french majority owned edf
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do we really want the french government charging us over the odds for energy, whilst subsidising their own people. let us hang on to some self respect. Why don't we build our own new reactors, we pay enough in taxes to cover thousands of them.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
